mapper.select: SELECT nbSubject FROM noticeboard WHERE nbId = #{iId}
SELECT nbSubject AS m_strSubject, nbContent AS m_strContent, nbReadCount AS m_iReadCount, nbInsertDate AS m_clsInsertDate, nbCommentCount AS m_iCommentCount FROM noticeboard WHERE nbId = #{iId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeboard( nbSubject, nbContent, nbReadCount, nbInsertDate, nbCommentCount ) VALUES( #{m_strSubject}, #{m_strContent}, #{m_iReadCount}, #{m_clsInsertDate}, #{m_iCommentCount} )
mapper.update: UPDATE noticeboard SET nbContent = #{m_strContent} WHERE nbId = #{m_iId}
